1.0.name: wordpress/simply-captcha
1.0.description: SimplyCaptcha is a new method of Captcha. It allows high customization, Simple questions are asked, and Users IP and User Agent is monitored for spam. It has a multi-layer security monitoring system. It is constantly monitoring for spammers and spambots. If it finds one, it will block them instantly. Its cloud based, so if they are blocked on your site, they are block on everyone's site using SimplyCaptcha.
